title: LF TOP plat + pref
body: We are a new team, pretty chilled. Currently ranked S1 after placements, our last top was a yorick main and although we had many great times with soaring highs and crushing lows it is time to move to the next chapter of our team and recruit a new top. Apllicants must not be assholes and pref have teamspeak.

replies.body: I can be in your team if you want IGN:thechokeshotpro
Hey man, currently plat 5 and i main top. Add me :)
